title: PLSC 501 - Spring 2024
text:
This is the course website for PLSC 501 - it is a data science course focused on data management, coding in R, and learning basic regression techniques in OLS and MLE.

Code and Data

About me
Professor of political science, Iâ€™ve taught this class for a long time. My real effort in the last 15 years or so has been to retool it into a data-science-heavy class to leave students with modern coding, data wrangling, and modeling tools. PhD Florida State 1999. I study models of political violence.
